## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Column()](./ngw-orm.column.md) | Column decorator is used to mark a specific class property as a table column. Only properties decorated with this decorator will be persisted to the database when entity be saved. |
|  [Column(type)](./ngw-orm.column_1.md) | Column decorator is used to mark a specific class property as a table column. Only properties decorated with this decorator will be persisted to the database when entity be saved. |
|  [Column(options)](./ngw-orm.column_2.md) | Column decorator is used to mark a specific class property as a table column. Only properties decorated with this decorator will be persisted to the database when entity be saved. |
